settings.title: Settings
settings.language_change_restart: Please restart the application to fully apply the language change.

errors.failed_to_load_config: Failed to load configuration! Falling back to default settings.

Failed to get latest version list from GitHub!

{error}
errors.file_read_only_message:
Cannot write to read-only file {path}!

Press [Confirm] to remove this flag and continue.

github.api_limit:
Your IP has reached the GitHub API request limit!

GitHub servers will ignore further connection attempts for one hour.

Set up (another) *proxy* or *GitHub token* in launcher settings for immediate access.
github.bad_credentials:
GitHub personal access token is invalid!

Please configure the correct token in launcher settings.
github.invalid_release_notes: <font color="red">‚ö† Error! Invalid release notes format! ‚ö†</font>

Launcher initialization failed!

Curly brackets { and } are not supported in path:
{root_path}

Please reinstall the launcher to another location.

migoto.failed_to_detect_process:
Failed to detect game process {process_name}!

If the game window takes longer than {timeout} seconds to appear, please adjust the timeout in launcher settings.

If the game crashes, try clearing the Mods and ShaderFixes folders.

Failed to stop {process_name}!

Please close the game manually and press [OK] to continue.

Failed to start XXMI Updater.exe!

Failed to inject extra library {dll_path}:

Please check Advanced Settings -> Inject Libraries.
common.file_removal_restriction: File or folder removal is only allowed from Core or ShaderFixes folders!
common.folder_removal_restriction: Explicitly removing entire Core or ShaderFixes folders is not allowed!

wwmi.configure_settings_failed:
Failed to configure in-game settings for WWMI!

wwmi.installation_damaged:
Wuthering Waves installation is damaged!

Removing NVIDIA plugins is no longer necessary and may cause crashes!

Please repair the game using the official launcher (wrench button in the top right).

Failed to configure in-game settings for ZZMI!

Star Rail registry key not found!

Please first launch the game without 120 FPS patch, change any FPS value to create a record, then try again.

Note: This patch only supports the global client, not the CN version.

main.title: XXMI Launcher
main.theme_update_message:
Selected {0} theme cannot be loaded!

Click `Use Default` to use default theme instead (ensures proper visuals).
Click `Patch Theme` to replace `custom-tkinter-theme.json` with new one.
main.theme_folder_missing:
Failed to load {0} theme:

Theme folder does not exist!
main.theme_file_missing:
Failed to load {0} theme:

Theme file `custom-tkinter-theme.json` does not exist!

tooltip.unsafe_mode_warning:
Allows the use of third-party 3dmigoto DLLs.
Please ensure you only use files from trusted sources!
tooltip.package_release_notes_not_installed: Click the **Install** button to set up the package.
tooltip.package_description_launcher: *This package is the XXMI Launcher application itself, defining its functionality.*
tooltip.package_description_xxmi_libraries: *The XXMI Libraries package is a custom 3dmigoto build used for handling data between the GPU and game processes.*
tooltip.package_description_model_importer: *The Model Importer package provides the set of API functions needed for mods to work in a specific game.*
tooltip.importer_folder:
Path containing the `Mods` folder, `d3dx.ini` and other {importer} resources.
**Absolute path**: Set any folder, e.g. `C:/Games/{importer}/`.
**Relative path**: Set any folder inside the launcher folder, e.g. `{importer}/` (default).
tooltip.game_folder_wwmi:
Path containing "Wuthering Waves.exe" and both "Client" and "Engine" subfolders.
Typically this folder is named "Wuthering Waves Game" inside the Wuthering Waves installation directory.
tooltip.game_folder_srmi:
Path containing "StarRail.exe".
Typically this folder is named "Games" inside the "DATA" folder of the Star Rail installation directory.
tooltip.game_folder_gimi:
Path containing "GenshinImpact.exe" or "YuanShen.exe" (CN version).
Typically this folder is named "Genshin Impact Game" inside the "DATA" folder of the Genshin Impact installation directory.
tooltip.overwrite_d3dx:
Enabled: {importer} updates will overwrite existing d3dx.ini to ensure it's up to date.
Disabled: {importer} updates will leave existing d3dx.ini unchanged.
tooltip.unsafe_mode:
Enabled: Allows the use of third-party 3dmigoto dlls.
Disabled: Doesn't allow the use of third-party 3dmigoto dlls.
Note: If a third-party d3d11.dll doesn't support running from a nested directory, it won't load.
tooltip.option_enabled_effect:
Enabled: The option will have the specified effect.
Disabled: The option will have no effect.
tooltip.run_pre_launch:
Windows console command to execute before the game exe is launched.
Note: Set this if you need to perform actions before the game launches.
tooltip.wait_for_command: Enabled: Wait (block) for the command to finish execution before launching the game exe.
tooltip.custom_launch:
Windows console command to run when clicking the launch button, instead of the default game exe launch method.
Tip: If you only want to change the injection method, leave this field empty.
Warning! This command will also override the `Launch Options` in general settings.
tooltip.custom_launch_wwmi: Warning! Make sure to pass `Client -DisableModule=streamline` parameters to Client-Win64-Shipping.exe to force DX11 mode!
tooltip.custom_launch_example:
Note: Set this if you want to launch the game exe with another custom exe.
Example (equivalent to launcher's internal command for launching GI via FPS unlocker):
`start /d "C:\Games\XXMI Launcher\Resources\Packages\GI-FPS-Unlocker" unlockfps_nc.exe`
tooltip.custom_launch_inject_mode:
Defines how 3dmigoto is injected into the game process via custom launch.
* Inject: Uses WriteProcessMemory, more reliable but requires direct memory access.
* Hook: Uses SetWindowsHookEx, less reliable but might interfere less with anti-cheat systems.
* Bypass: Skips 3dmigoto injection, only processes inject libraries field.
tooltip.run_post_load:
Windows console command to execute after the d3d11.dll hook is injected into the game exe.
Note: Set this if you need to perform actions after 3dmigoto is injected.
tooltip.wait_post_command: Enabled: Wait (block) for the command to finish execution before continuing program flow.
tooltip.inject_libraries:
List of additional DLL paths to inject into the game process. One path per line.
Injection will be done via the WriteProcessMemory method.
Example (injecting ReShade dll):
`C:\Games\ReShade\ReShade64.dll`
tooltip.enable_hunting:
Enabled: Allows toggling hunting mode via numpad [0] hotkey.
* [d3dx.ini]: hunting = 2
Disabled: Hunting mode is forcibly disabled.
* [d3dx.ini]: hunting = 0
tooltip.dump_shaders:
Enabled: [Copy Hash] key in hunting mode also saves selected shader as a file in ShaderFixes.
* [d3dx.ini]: marking_actions = clipboard hlsl asm regex
Disabled: [Copy Hash] in hunting mode only copies selected shader hash to clipboard.
* [d3dx.ini]: marking_actions = clipboard
tooltip.mute_warnings:
Enabled: No error warnings or beeps whatsoever. Ignorance is bliss.
* [d3dx.ini]: show_warnings = 0
Disabled: Ini parser error warnings and beeps on F10 will plague the poor soul.
* [d3dx.ini]: show_warnings = 1
tooltip.calls_logging:
Enabled: Logs API usage.
* [d3dx.ini]: calls = 1
Disabled: No calls logging. Maximum performance.
* [d3dx.ini]: calls = 0
tooltip.debug_logging:
Enabled: Super verbose debug logging.
* [d3dx.ini]: debug = 1
Disabled: No debug logging. Maximum performance.
* [d3dx.ini]: debug = 0
tooltip.auto_close:
Enabled: The launcher will automatically close after game launch and 3dmigoto injection confirmation.
Disabled: The launcher will stay running.
tooltip.launch_options_tooltip: Command line arguments passed to the game executable when launching the game.
tooltip.launch_options_docs: View more information about available launch options.
tooltip.github_token:
Personal access token used to increase GitHub API limits, helping avoid API request restrictions.
You can create a new token on the GitHub website with only public repository read permissions.
tooltip.github_token_button: Open the **GitHub Personal Access Token** creation page.
tooltip.detect_game_folder: Attempt to automatically detect existing game installation folder
tooltip.process_priority:
Controls the priority of the game process when launched through the launcher.
Higher values provide better performance at the expense of other applications.

Warning: Setting this to "High" may cause system instability on performance-constrained PCs.
tooltip.unlock_fps_wwmi:
Uses SpecialK to unlock the game's framerate limit.
If enabled, the launcher will launch the game through SpecialK and set the framerate limit to 120.
tooltip.unlock_fps_srmi:
Uses SpecialK to unlock the game's framerate limit.
If enabled, the launcher will launch the game through SpecialK and set the framerate limit to 120.
tooltip.unlock_fps_gimi:
Uses GIPF unlocker to unlock the game's framerate limit.
If enabled, the launcher will launch the game through the FPS unlocker.
tooltip.unlock_fps_window_mode:
Choose window mode for the FPS unlocker:
 - Fullscreen: Exclusive fullscreen mode
 - Borderless: Borderless window (fake fullscreen)
 - Window: Windowed mode
tooltip.apply_tweaks:
Improves game performance by adding extra settings to Engine.ini.

The launcher will add the following sections to Engine.ini:
[/Script/Engine.StreamingSettings]
s.AsyncLoadingThreadEnabled=True

[/Script/Engine.Engine]
bSmoothFrameRate=False
MaximumLoopIterationCount=2147483647
bUseFixedFrameRate=False

[/Script/Engine.GarbageCollectionSettings]
gc.MaxObjectsNonEditor=2147483647
gc.MaxObjectsInEditor=2147483647
gc.MaxObjectsInGame=2147483647

Use "üîç Open Engine.ini" to view current settings.
tooltip.enable_hdr:
Enables High Dynamic Range (HDR) in the game.
This setting is only effective if your display supports HDR and Windows HDR is enabled.

The launcher will add the `-hdr` parameter to the game launch options.
Note: Some HDR-capable TVs may not detect proper HDR support.
tooltip.timeout:
Controls how long the launcher waits for the game window to appear after launching.
Once timeout is reached, the game process is considered crashed.
The default value is **30**.
tooltip.auto_update:
Enabled: Launcher and {importer} updates will automatically download and install.
Disabled: Use the special [‚ñ≤] button next to the [Start] button to manually download and install updates.
tooltip.update_channel:
**Auto**: Automatically detect update installation method.
**MSI**: Install updates using native `.msi` installer.
**ZIP**: Install updates using portable `.zip` package.
tooltip.launcher_theme:
Choose the launcher GUI theme.
Warning! The `Default` theme will be overwritten by launcher updates!
Steps to create a custom theme:
1. Create a copy of the `Default` folder in the `Themes` folder.
2. Rename the copy to the name you want to see in settings.
3. Edit or replace any images (valid extensions: webp, jpeg, png, jpg).
tooltip.dev_mode:
Enabled: The launcher will track changes in `custom-tkinter-theme.json` and apply them instantly.
Disabled: Theme changes won't be tracked.
tooltip.verify_ssl:
<font color="red">‚ö† Only disable if you trust your proxy or other SSL-breaking service. ‚ö†</font>
**Enabled**: Verify SSL certificates for GitHub downloads to maintain security.
**Disabled**: Allow insecure connections, potentially vulnerable to man-in-the-middle attacks.
tooltip.proxy_enable:
Controls how the launcher connects to GitHub to download packages.
**Enabled**: Use the specified proxy server to access the internet.
**Disabled**: Use default system internet connection settings.
tooltip.proxy_type:
**HTTPS**: Traditional proxy protocol offering best security.
**SOCKS5**: Newer and less secure, but excels at bypassing firewalls.
tooltip.proxy_dns:
**Enabled**: DNS requests are routed through the SOCKS5 proxy connection.
**Disabled**: DNS requests will be routed through your ISP.
tooltip.proxy_host: Proxy IP address (e.g. `123.12.1.231`) or domain name (e.g. `proxyprovider.com`).
tooltip.proxy_auth:
**Enabled**: Use specified username and password for proxy server authentication.
**Disabled**: Don't use any credentials when accessing the proxy server.
tooltip.proxy_user: Username provided by your proxy service provider.
tooltip.proxy_password: Password provided by your proxy service provider.
tooltip.disable_wounded_effect:
Disables the red screen effect when wounded.

The launcher will modify UserSettings.ini, adding:
[/Game/HighElves/Config/HighElvesSettings.HighElvesSettings_C]
IsWoundBloodVFXEnabled=False
tooltip.configure_game_wwmi:
When enabled, adjusts game settings for better mod rendering.
Specifically, the launcher will modify "Client\Config\UserSettings.ini" adding:
 - `IsPointLightShadowEnabled=False`
 - `IsScreenSpaceReflectionEnabled=False`
 - `SubsurfaceScatteringQuality=0`
tooltip.configure_game_zzmi:
When enabled, adjusts game settings for better mod rendering.
Specifically, the launcher will modify "GraphicsSettings.json" to disable certain post-processing effects.
tooltip.configure_game_srmi:
When enabled, adjusts game settings for better mod rendering.
Specifically, the launcher will modify "AppData\LocalLow\Cognosphere\Star Rail\Player.ini" to disable certain post-processing effects.
tooltip.configure_game_gimi:
When enabled, adjusts game settings for better mod rendering.
Specifically, the launcher will add these commands to the [Constants] section in d3dx.ini:
 - `UseBloom=0`
 - `UseFXAA=0`
 - `UseVignette=0`

If disabled, these overrides will be removed (or left unchanged if manually edited).

messages.wounded_effect_message:
It appears that wounded effects are enabled in game settings.
Most mods don't support this effect, and textures will be damaged after taking a few hits.

Click `Disable` to turn it off to ensure correct rendering of mod textures.
Click `Keep Enabled` if you never get wounded or use a wounded effect removal tool.
